summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account for the period from March 1, 2018, to March 31, 2018. It details the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, indicating a balance of $9,253.53 at the end of the period.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $59,789.55 and an ending balance of $9,253.53 as of March 31, 2018.
There were electronic bill payments totaling $536.00 during the statement period.
No service charges or overdraft fees were incurred during this statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
The account is held at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
